title: Daddy-Long-Legs
description: This is an alternate cover edition for ISBN 978-0141331119, this book. Laugh out loud at Judy's charming and unforgettable lettersYoung Judy Abbott has been saved from life at the orphanage by a generous--and anonymous--guardian. He will pay for her education if she promises to write to him every month. Judy writes the most exuberant and lively letters--packed with laughs, and tales of friendship and college life. Judy's having so much fun she can scarcely stop writing...
author: Jean Webster
